title: Track stars: the unseen heroes of movie sound
creator_credit: Film Arts, Learning Corporation of America and Terry Burke
brief_description: Split-screen technique is used to demonstrate how “track stars” - movie sound specialists - painstakingly match sounds to the action of the characters who are being filmed.
